resources.string: Look for the verification email in your inbox and click the link in that email for verification.
Be a student of University of South Asia,We feel proud and be a part of BCSE. Specially thanks to our honorable all BCSE department teachers.

OwnIMEI is the platform which show the owner of the device and current status of the device.It will protect the device from cloning. Check If the phone/laptop has been lost/stolen any where in the world. If you are going to buy used phone/laptop, Make sure that it has not been reported as lost/stolen.
Your claim has been accepted. Now it is under considering. We will notify you the result in your mail within 24 working hours.
